title: "Song plays"
output: github_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

```{r load data}

songs <- read.csv(here::here("05_simple_metrics", "rmd_music.csv")) %>%
  mutate(rank = dplyr::row_number())

head(songs)

```

```{r}

ggplot(songs, aes(rank, Plays)) +
  geom_line()

```
